message:
Improved ViewEngine and Rebuilt ModelMapper
* ModelMapper now works recursively
* ViewEngine now supports multiline CSharp-only Syntax with the "@{" operator
* ViewEngine now correctly exports the Principal to the Views
* Implement Conditional Header Rendering in _Layout View
* Deleted Header in all Views
* Removed Home View, and implemented conditional rendering on Index View
* Fixed Model Binding to work with collections both natively and in complex binding models
